title: Legal Section - Work Permit Regulations

sections.heading: Section 1: Definitions
sections.text:
**Work permit** means a written authorization to work in Canada issued to a foreign national by an officer.

**Employer** means a person or organization that employs or engages a foreign national to perform work.

sections.heading: 2.1 General Requirements
2.2 Labour Market Impact Assessment
sections.text: An employer must obtain a positive Labour Market Impact Assessment (LMIA) before hiring a foreign worker, except where an exemption applies under paragraph R204(a) or (c).
